    Brick​(int x, int y, boolean isMetal, boolean hasSurprise, java.awt.Color color)

  • Constructor Details

    • Brick

      public Brick​(int x, int y, boolean isMetal, boolean hasSurprise, java.awt.Color color)
      This constructs a brick with a specified x, y, type, isMetal, hasSurprise and color.
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate of the brick location
      y - the y coordinate of the brick location
      type - the type of the brick
      isMetal - the boolean whether the brick is metal or not
      hasSurprise - the boolean whether the brick has surprise or not
      color - the color of the brick
